allCeremoniesPageSubtitle: Explore all of our upcoming and past healing events.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Release mental and emotional blocks, allowing you to see your life from a new perspective.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deep connection with yourself, with others, and with the universe.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Heal past wounds and let go of negative patterns that no longer serve you.
ceremoniesPageSubtitle: Explore all of our upcoming and past healing events.
contactCommunityText: Join our community to connect with other seekers and stay up to date with our latest news and events. We are here to support you on your journey.
continueRegistrationDescription: Complete the following information to continue with your registration.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced team that will accompany you with respect and professionalism on your journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, benefits, and transformative power of the sacred drink Ayahuasca.
footerText: Â© {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
groupCeremonyDescription: A safe and supportive space where the group's energy enhances the individual and collective healing experience. Ideal for those seeking a shared journey.
guidesPageSubtitle: A team of experienced and compassionate facilitators dedicated to your healing journey.
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca acts as a mirror to the soul, revealing what needs to be healed. Through visions and deep introspection, it guides you on a journey of self-discovery and purification.
notFoundDescription: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
preparationCtaDescription: Find all the information you need to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for a profound and meaningful experience.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, tailored to your specific needs. Perfect for those seeking a deeper and more personal approach to their healing process.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a spiritual master. It teaches you, guides you, and shows you the way to a deeper understanding of yourself and the universe.
testimonialsPageSubtitle: Listen to the stories of those who have walked this path before you.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancient sacred drink from the Amazon, used for centuries in healing rituals. It is a powerful tool for introspection, personal growth, and spiritual connection.
contentMigrationDescription: This tool allows you to migrate texts from the local `common.json` files to the Firestore database. New keys will be added, and existing ones will not be modified.
migrationToolDescription: Start the process to move texts from the `common.json` files to the `content` collection in Firestore.
tutorialDescription: Here's a quick tour of the tools we've prepared for you.
tutorialSlideSpiritualGuideDescription: Chat with our AI guide to answer questions about Ayahuasca, preparation, and the integration process. It's here to support you.
tutorialSlideDreamInterpreterDescription: Log your dreams and experiences. Our AI will offer interpretations from a shamanic and Jungian perspective.
tutorialSlidePreparationDescription: Complete your health questionnaire and follow the preparation guide to ensure a safe and profound experience.
tutorialSlideCommunityDescription: Explore our upcoming ceremonies, see memories from past events, and connect with our community.
noDreamEntries: You haven't recorded any dreams yet. Use the field below to start your journal.
dreamInterpreterDescription: Describe your dream or experience to receive a symbolic interpretation.
chatbotWelcome: Welcome! I am your spiritual guide. How can I help you on your path today? Feel free to ask about Ayahuasca, preparation, or our ceremonies.
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again later.
dreamInterpreterAuth: You must be logged in to use the dream interpreter.
dreamInterpretationError: Sorry, an error occurred while interpreting your dream. Please try again.
microphoneErrorDescription: Could not access the microphone. Please check your browser permissions.
transcriptionErrorDescription: Could not transcribe the audio. Please try again.
themeCustomizationDescription: Select a predefined theme or customize the colors of your application.
enterNewThemeName: Enter a name for the new theme:
deleteThemeConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the theme "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
migrationWarningDescription: This process will read your local translation files and add any new keys to Firestore. Existing keys in Firestore will NOT be modified. This action is irreversible.
spiritualGuideDescription: Ask about the medicine, the ceremonies, and how to prepare.
